name: archetypal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
typical of an original thing from which others are copied: an archetypal English gentleman They live in an archetypal country village. See
archetype
More examplesFewer examplesThe dioramas at the natural history museum were archetypal old-style exhibitions.With his thin moustache and well-tailored clothes he is the archetypal image of a screen villain. Some people saw him as the archetypal science nerd.
